title: Bitcoin SV

content: We don't care who you are and why are you here. We are not intersting of you and your services. But since you demand so much pay attention from us to you, then get:Are you sick or what?:https://loyce.club/archive/posts/6321/63218286.htmlQuote from: digaran on November 25, 2023, 10:51:53 AM@OP, if you need an advocate for your case against nutildah, I am available, but I can't accept bsv for my fee.$2m I will fight for you, forget about the insults, if you needed it I will publicly apologize to show you I'm serious.ðŸ˜‰https://loyce.club/archive/posts/6321/63218371.htmlQuote from: digaran on November 25, 2023, 11:16:22 AMWell, I have to place $7000 for collateral to the court for a case related to real estate, they will give it back in 7-10 days, it's due for tomorrow, forget about advocacy, I will give you something better. Think about it and let me know, I don't want to sell my car for it.ðŸ˜‘LaterQuote from: digaran on November 25, 2023, 11:16:22 AMWell, I have to place $7000 for collateral to the court for a case related to real estate, they will give it back in 7-10 days, it's due for tomorrow, forget about advocacy, I will give you something better. Think about it and let me know, I don't want to sell my car for it.ðŸ˜‘Edit, too late, car dealer called, they sold it already. Â I'm not in the mood to argue with anyone, just don't appear in my sight, I am allergic to bs.Feel free to burn my love letters.

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin SV on November 25, 2023, 10:58:50 AMQuote from: digaran on November 25, 2023, 10:51:53 AM@OP, if you need an advocate for your case against nutildah, I am available, but I can't accept bsv for my fee.$2m I will fight for you, forget about the insults, if you needed it I will publicly apologize to show you I'm serious.ðŸ˜‰OK. Welcome to BSV community. Be our friendI can't promise anything about payment. Assistant positions are already occupiedListen, did you read what I said about my girl etc on meta? I wasn't joking. Now since I'm a sick person, at least I'm not desperate like you, I mean look at your own post.I wanted to post and say "well, that was fast" and laugh at you, for being so desperate and gullible. But I spared you.Now one thing you should know, when someone insults me, they will pay the price, and if you believe I insulted you first, think again, I have your post where you tried to persuade people to use your scam coin.In here we strive for freedom under the rules of law, you on the other hand, advocate for censorship and dictate your the opinions of a few to your userbase.You are a disgrace for anything related to fighting for freedom, therefore your opinion is NOT valid.OK, welcome. LolWhich services do you refer to? I mean I can't even remove my own tags no matter how wrong they are.Also if sm posted here, don't quote her, I will put you on ignore as well, I will never talk or engage with such hateful person anymore. You along with anyone else, can show yourselves to my trust page, Â and remember, a miserable jobless clown has nothing to lose, you bullies however.

comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin SV on November 29, 2023, 05:45:00 PMQuote from: digaran on November 29, 2023, 05:37:31 PMYou are a disgrace for anything related to fighting for freedom, therefore your opinion is NOT valid.In my opinion, you're the only one disgracing yourself herehttps://loyce.club/archive/posts/6323/63237931.htmlQuote from: digaran on November 29, 2023, 01:43:06 AMFirst you kneel, and then perform a circle bj for all community members, me excluded, then we will welcome you as our co**sucker bitch nothing more. LolzI don't see anything wrong in my suggestion, as I have said this in the past, we don't care who is satoshi in real life because he doesn't own the name Bitcoin, that is why we believe anyone trying to claim to be him and demand ownership of the name Bitcoin, is considered a fraud.So when I mix jokes and profanity to convey a meaning, because I don't want to explain myself in long posts.Â  By reading that strike through line, now you realize that we are not interested in knowing satoshi's real identity, why? Because it will destroy his legendary image in the world.Can you imagine him being active here and a nobody like me, talks like garbage to him? How humiliating it could be for him? I mean even now I have some criticisms posted from time to time, but since he is not active here to respond, his image will remain the same "legendary".So spare me the dignity lessons, you can not indignify me, because your opinion is NOT valid.

comments.created_time: November 30, 2023, 10:37:08 AMLast edit: November 30, 2023, 10:52:41 AM by digaran
comments.body: Not only a beggar, but a stray dog has more honor than you, if you feed it once, it will become loyal for life, on the other hand, you were given the chance to have financial freedom by using Bitcoin, what did you do? You went the opposite direction by advocating for a scam that takes all the financial freedom away from people, So I'd say you are anti-satoshi of Bitcoin's universe. Â And I am death the destroyer of worlds. Lol^256-2^32. ðŸ˜‰What a radicalized noob I was back then. ðŸ™ƒListen, let me tell you who I am, I am invisible for being so transparent, so here what I can get from this idiocy,You are trying to corner me and make me look weak and innocent to make your enemies to be my friends and back me up here, in order to buy my loyalty. Or you are doing this knowing nobody gives a single sat about me, just to cut me off from this community and prove to me I'm a worthless clown here to lure me to your side. News flash, nobody gives a single sat about any of this, but now that you opened my eyes to this fact, I spare you and your worthless scam coin. My loyalty is to the people and Bitcoin, not a corrupted little community lost in hatred and discrimination.
